info.name: Youtube - Centered clean video pages
info.description: As with my other clean video page style, it removes the comments, related/recommended videos, and footer of the site. This style also centers the search bar, video, and description.
info.additionalInfo:
2013-03-22: Updated to work with Youtube changes.
2012-12-15: Fixed larger video size expanding to the right.
2012-12-15: Initial version.
